subject: Medicine
title: The Doctor Effect
description: A quick, practical guide to The Doctor Effect.

hook.text: A warm, confident doctor is part of the medicine.

buildup.text: How a doctor speaks and listens changes patient outcomes.

discovery.text: Empathy and reassurance amplify the placebo response.

twist.text: Cold, rushed consultations can weaken real drug effects.

climax.text: Training doctors in communication improves treatment results.

quiz.question: How does a doctor's communication style affect treatment?
options: It amplifies or reduces the placebo response
It has no effect on outcomes
It only matters for mental health
